Plot: In a continuation of Full House, D.J. Fuller is a mother of three young boys and is a recent widow. D.J.'s sister Stephanie, her best friend Kimmy and Kimmy's teenage daughter all move in to help raise her sons. The house is now a lot fuller.
Title: Fuller House
Actors: Candace Cameron Bure, Jodie Sweetin, Andrea Barber, Michael Campion
